vistra.app.view.component.mouse

Class Editing

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.AbstractGraphMousePlugin
      • edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.EditingGraphMousePlugin<ILayoutVertex,ILayoutEdge>
        • vistra.app.view.component.mouse.Editing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.GraphMousePlugin, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Editing
extends edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.EditingGraphMousePlugin<ILayoutVertex,ILayoutEdge>
    An adapted JUNG mouse plug-in for editing graph items. This plugin creates vertices and edges and denies self loops.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
